title: Permanently banned, but haven't received any details.
body:
I've recently been permanently banned from LoL on the Oceanic server, wasn't sure if I could still post on here and be banned but idk. Just hoping I could be emailed the reasons why and some details other details on why it was quite all of a sudden etc. I also sent in a support ticket yesterday (#20606331) and am sure you're very busy but was just hoping I could get some clarity. 

Kind regards, Myself. (Big Mac)

replies.body:
Hey Big Mac,

They'll get back to you on that ban in the support ticket, it could just take a few days. Make sure your email is verified by clicking your profile in the top right and going to **Settings**, and that Riot Games is not blacklisted and sending emails to your spam folder.

-DTN

Hey DTN, was wondering if I could get another email from riot, turns out I didn't diversify my email and for some reason don't have a spam folder, if possible could I be sent another one, spent a lot of Rp on my JacobJJ account

Thanks

Not sure if they can send you a duplicate email from that, but they can definitely follow up on your case and provide what details they can if you submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
